about_the_game:
Experience an electrifying journey through an immersive 80s sci-fi world with Neon Skylines

Take control of your spacecraft as you soar through procedurally generated neon environments at breakneck speeds. Keep your reflexes sharp as you deftly maneuver to avoid obstacles and reach new heights in this thrilling 3D procedural arcade game.

With the power to slow down time at your fingertips, you'll need quick thinking and lightning-fast reactions to achieve the highest scores and soar above the competition.
detailed_description:
Experience an electrifying journey through an immersive 80s sci-fi world with Neon Skylines

Take control of your spacecraft as you soar through procedurally generated neon environments at breakneck speeds. Keep your reflexes sharp as you deftly maneuver to avoid obstacles and reach new heights in this thrilling 3D procedural arcade game.

With the power to slow down time at your fingertips, you'll need quick thinking and lightning-fast reactions to achieve the highest scores and soar above the competition.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Blast off into a neon sci-fi world in Neon Skylines, a thrilling 3D procedural arcade game. Use your time-slowing powers to avoid obstacles and reach new heights in high-speed gameplay
